Detailed Description

Class implementing image filters.

Now supports: blur, gain

xwindow size
void ModuleFilters::changeGain ( int  x ) [slot]

Changes gain factor.

Gain factor is counted by dividing int value by 100 in order to get factor double value. If value has to be greater than 100 to change.

Parameters:
xgain value <100;*> divided by 100 to get factor

void ModuleFilters::process ( Mat &  mat )

Processes current frame.

Applies filters if necessary. Blur is applied only when window size > 1. Gain is applied only when factor > 1;

Parameters:
matto be processed
